sourcesContent:
import gql from "graphql-tag"

const GET_USER_BY_ID = gql`
  query users ($id: String!) {
    user (id: $id) {
      address
      avatar
      birthday
      email
      facebook
      first_name
      gender
      google_id
      id
      intro
      last_name
      phone
      mobile
      skype
      username
      viber
      website
      zalo
      created_at
      updated_at
    }
  }
`;
// description, name, cover, address, phone, email, mobile, mobile, image,
// const GET_USER_ID = gql
export {
  GET_USER_BY_ID,
}
